Captain.Title: Gul Lemec
Captain.Ability: When attacking a ship whose Captain has a lower Skill number than Gul Lemec's, gain +1 attack die against that ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Ocett
Captain.Ability: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [CRIT], you may search the Damage Deck for a "Power Disruption" or a "Minor Explosion" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

Captain.Title: Gul Madred
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a lower Skill number than Gul Madred, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number equal to or greater than Gul Madred, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a lower Skill number than Gul Madred, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number equal to or greater than Gul Madred, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.
